title: MBMBaM 508: Face 2 Face: The Pepsi Proposal
description: Hey, this is a weird one! For one thing, it’s a live show, which is a strange thing to listen to. For another thing, it’s a selection of bits from two different performances aboard the JoCo Cruise, so it’s a little patchwork-y and disjointed. We’ll be back with a regular ep next week!
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
